description: This file defines a React functional component named TodoList, which renders a list of tasks or an empty state message if no tasks are provided. It receives tasks and callback functions as props, sorts tasks by creation date, and maps each task to a TodoItem component.

methods.name: TodoList({ tasks = [], onToggle, onDelete, onUpdate })
methods.description: React functional component that renders a list of tasks or an empty message, with sorting and delegation to TodoItem components.

ctags.name: TodoList
ctags.pattern: /^export default function TodoList({ tasks = [], onToggle, onDelete, onUpdate }) {$/
